notifs.name: Notifications
notifs.desc:
Change notifications for when BirdBox notices something about your message. 
Defaults to `reply` if not set.

snipes.name: Snipe Logging
snipes.desc:
Change whether your deleted messages are logged for the snipe command. Both the member and server must consent for the message to be logged. 
Defaults to `disable` if not set.

notif_channel.name: Notifications Channel
notif_channel.desc:
Change the channel notification logs are sent to. 
If not set, logs will be disabled.

announce_channel.name: Announcements Channel
announce_channel.desc:
Change the default channel the announce command sends to. 
If not set, defaults to the channel announce is run in.

responses.name: Keyword/Lyric Responses
responses.desc:
Toggle whether keyword and lyric responses are enabled for this server. 
Defaults to `enable` if not set.

jinxes.name: Jinx Responses
jinxes.desc:
Toggle whether BirdBox responds to two identical messages sent in quick succession. 
Defaults to `enable` if not set.

pinning.name: Pin/Unpin Permissions
pinning.desc:
Change who can use the pin command. Under the `restricted` option, anyone can pin but not unpin in channels, and only thread owners can do either in threads. 
Defaults to `restricted` if not set.

server_snipes.name: Snipe Logging
server_snipes.desc:
Change whether this server's deleted messages are logged for the snipe command. Both the member and server must consent for the message to be logged. 
Defaults to `enable` if not set.

status.name: Status
status.desc: Change the bot's status to display on its profile.
